paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: mother: asymptomatic, QTc interval 445 ms; daughter: symptomatic, QTc interval 571 ms
patients.phenotype: LQT2, with the mother being asymptomatic and the daughter experiencing syncope-like events

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The LQT patients in this work (mother: asymptomatic, QTc interval 445 ms; daughter: symptomatic, QTc interval 571 ms) showed contrarious phenotypes despite the same mutation.

individual_records.phenotype_details: symptomatic, syncope-like events after arousal from sleep, QTc interval 571 ms
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the symptomatic patient, syncope-like events took place after arousal from sleep, as typical for LQT2.

functional_data.summary: hiPSC-CMs from both symptomatic and asymptomatic patients showed different action potential durations reflecting in vivo penetrance.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance of the G1681 mutation in KCNH2 shows variability between family members.
key_quotes: The LQT patients in this work (mother: asymptomatic, QTc interval 445 ms; daughter: symptomatic, QTc interval 571 ms) showed contrarious phenotypes despite the same mutation.
In the symptomatic patient, syncope-like events took place after arousal from sleep, as typical for LQT2.

individual_records.phenotype_details: asymptomatic with a missense mutation in KCNH2
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Lahti et al. used skin biopsy-derived iPSCs of an asymptomatic individual with a missense mutation in KCNH2 causing arginine-to-tryptophan substitution at position 176 (R176, hERG-FinB).

functional_data.summary: Ventricular-like APs showed significant elongation, especially at low frequencies.

variants.additional_notes: EADs were observed in LQT2-hiPSC-CMs but not in WT-hiPSC-CMs.
key_quotes: Only ventricular-like APs showed a significant elongation, especially at low frequencies.
EADs were observed in 1 out of 20 LQT2-hiPSC-CMs and were never observed in WT- hiPSC-CMs.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were extracted thoroughly.
